# UITextSearchOptions.WordMatchMethod.startsWith

**Case**

The word contains the search string as a prefix.

## Declaration

```swift
case startsWith
```

## Constants

- **UITextSearchOptions.WordMatchMethod.contains**: The word contains the search string.
- **UITextSearchOptions.WordMatchMethod.fullWord**: The word matches the search string exactly.
